txt_en: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors, and let every new year find you a better man.
txt_cn: 与恶癖作战，与邻里为友，新的一年成为更好的人。
author: Benjamin Franklin

txt_en: To know yourself is the first and most important step in pursuing your dreams and goals.
txt_cn: 了解自己是追求梦想和目标的第一步，也是最重要的一步。
author: Stedman Graham

txt_en: The more things you do, the more you can do.
txt_cn: 你做的事情越多，能做到的事情就越多。
author: Lucille Ball

txt_en: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
txt_cn: 所有的成就和财富都是从一个想法开始的。
author: Napolean Hill

txt_en: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
txt_cn: 想象力让我们突破极限。
author: John Muir

txt_en: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
txt_cn: 凡是有废墟的地方，就有可能藏着宝藏。
author: Jalaluddin Rumi

txt_en: In the middle of every difficulty comes opportunity.
txt_cn: 每一个困境中都会出现机会。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: Respect other people's feelings. It might mean nothing to you, but it could mean everything to them.
txt_cn: 尊重他人的感受。这对你可能无关紧要，但可能对他人十分重要。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
txt_cn: 改变你的想法，就是改变了你的世界。
author: Norman Vincent Peale

txt_en: Skill and confidence are an unconquered army.
txt_cn: 技能和信心是一支不可战胜的军队。
author: George Herbert

txt_en: And so rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
txt_cn: 人生的低谷成为了我重建生活的坚实基础。
author: J. K. Rowling

txt_en: Life is the sum of all your choices.
txt_cn: 你做的所有抉择造就了你的人生。
author: Albert Camus

txt_en: You are not beaten until you admit it.
txt_cn: 在你承认之前，你尚未失败。
author: George Patton

txt_en: In the end, life teaches us what is important, and that is family.
txt_cn: 生活最终会让我们明白什么最重要，那就是家庭。
author: Stephen Covey

txt_en: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other one thing.
txt_cn: 牢记一点，你想要成功的决心比其他任何事情都重要。
author: Abraham Lincoln

txt_en: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
txt_cn: 幸福是责任自然而然生出的花朵。
author: Phillips Brooks

txt_en: The greatest test of courage is to bear defeat without losing heart.
txt_cn: 接受失败而不气馁是对勇气最大的考验。
author: Robert Ingersoll
